aka: 可儿家族都柏林现场演唱会实况

cast.name: 安德莉亚·可儿 Andrea Corr

director.name: 哈密什·汉密尔顿 Hamish Hamilton

this_title: VH1 Presents: The Corrs, Live in Dublin
trans_title: 可儿家族都柏林现场演唱会实况
introduction: VH1 Presents: The Corrs, Live In Dublin is an album which is a live performance performed by the Irish celtic folk-rock band, The Corrs in Dublin, Ireland who are accompanied by the Irish Film Orchestra. The Corrs have performed previous released songs with a slight remix into it. Also, this album highlights include a duet with Bono of U2 performing Ryan Adams' "When the Stars Go Blue" and "Summer Wine". The Corrs also perform "Little Wing", featuring a guitar solo by Ronnie Wood who later also performs the melodic Rolling Stones song "Ruby Tuesday" alongside The Corrs.Track listing:Would You Be Happier? (The Corrs)Breathless (The Corrs, Mutt Lange)When the Stars Go Blue (Ryan Adams) [Featuring Bono]Little Wing (Jimi Hendrix) [Featuring Ronnie Wood]Joy Of Life/Trout In The Bath (Traditional)Runaway (The Corrs)Only Love Can Break Your Heart (Neil Young)Radio (The Corrs)Summer Wine (Lee Hazlewood) [Featuring Bono]So Young (The Corrs)Ruby Tuesday (Mick Jagger, Keith Richards) [Featuring Ronnie Wood]
chinese_title: VH1 Presents: The Corrs, Live in Dublin
